instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no post
threads.message: this one is pecular because  it hesitates by about 10 seconds before it beeps without the ram installed and when the ram is installed it hesitates before the cpu vcore drops to .8v like it should but it doesn't want to post. i'm not sure what to check. all rails are present as far as i know

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no post
threads.message:
Check for USB activity; test both ports.
Even better to use an USB OSX pendrive with Link LED.
If flashes, then has 100% activity.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no post
threads.message: i'm getting no usb activity. i'm also getting no reading on pin 5 and 6 of the bios
